Content.Question:
CONVERSATION 1
Jane: Hello, Lisa.
Lisa: Hello, Jane.
Rob: Hello.
Lisa: Hello Rob. How are you?
Jane: I’m fine, thanks. You look
well. You've changed (You / change)
your hair.
Lisa: I decided (I / decide) to get
it coloured. What do you think?
Jane: It looks great!
Lisa: Oh, thanks. Come on, let’s get you a drink …
CONVERSATION 2
Rob: Nick, come over here. I want to take a photo with you and Lisa.
Nick: Just a minute, I haven't finished
(I / not / finish) this yet …
Jane: That’s okay. I’ll look after them.
Nick: Thanks. Okay, Rob, I'm coming
(I / come). How do you want us?
Rob: Can you stand closer together?
Nick: Is this okay?
Rob: That’s fine. Say ‘cheese’.
Nick and Lisa: ‘Cheese!’
CONVERSATION 3
Jane: What’s the matter, Rob?
Rob: I've lost (I / lose) my car key. Has anybody seen my car key?
Nick: When did you last have (you / last / have)
it?
Rob: Well, I know I had it a minute ago but I put it down somewhere.
Jane: Have you checked (you / check) all your pockets?
Rob: Yes, I've already tried (I / already / try) there.
It must be … somewhere.
